casebody.data:
STATE v. TORRES. No. COA04-1578. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed January 17, 2006. Certification Date February 6, 2006. Appeal from Buncombe (03CRS62239, 03CRS62240, 03CRS62241, 03CRS62242).

Case reported without published opinion. No error in defendant's trial; Vacated and remended for resentencing.
